file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 27-35-02-04 - ELEVATOR ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELEVATOR ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the actuating knob and pull cable assembly of the elevator disconnect system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE AS- ALL 27-35-02-000-801-A SEMBLY - REMOVAL ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE AS- ALL 27-35-02-400-801-A SEMBLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 27-35-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-35-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the actuating knob and pull cable assembly of the elevator disconnect system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 25-11-01-000-801-A/400 PILOT SEAT - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Below the cockpit floor 124 Below the cockpit floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit 1 Helps the other technician Below the cockpit floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove cockpit underfloor access hatch 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the pilot seat (AMM TASK 25-11-01-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove floor panel 221EF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-35-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Cut and remove the tiedown straps (10) (2 positions) and (11). Refer to DET. C and D. (2) Remove the cotter pin (6), washer (5), and pin (3) to release the end of the pull cable (1) from the bellcrank (4). (3) Remove the nut (7) and washer (8), and release the end of the pull cable (1) from the support at the fuselage structure. (4) Loosen the nut (9). (5) Remove the screws (2) (2 positions). (6) Remove the actuating knob and pull cable assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-35-02 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Actuating Knob and Pull Cable Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B C D A ZONES 123 124 1. ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE ASSEMBLY 9. NUT DET. A 2. SCREW (2) PULL CABLE (AILERON FUSELAGE DISCONNECT SYSTEM) STRUCTURE CONTROL (REF.) (REF.) PEDESTAL (REF.) 10. TIEDOWN STRAP (2) ATTACHMENT PLATE (REF.) DET. C 1. PULL CABLE 11. TIEDOWN (ELEVATOR STRAP DISCONNECT SYSTEM) DET. D 1. PULL CABLE (ELEVATOR DISCONNECT SYSTEM) 3. PIN 4. BELLCRANK SUPPORT (FUSELAGE 5. WASHER STRUCTURE) DET. B (REF.) 8. WASHER 6. COTTERPIN 7. NUT 145AMM270258.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-35-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-35-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ACTUATING KNOB AND PULL CABLE ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the actuating knob and pull cable assembly of the elevator disconnect system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 25-11-01-400-801-A/400 PILOT SEAT - INSTALLATION OPERATIONAL CHECK OF THE ELEVATOR DIS- AMM TASK 27-35-00-700-801-A/500 CONNECT SYSTEM AMM TASK 28-41-00-200-801-A/600 - IPC 27-35-00 ELEVATOR DISCONNECT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Below the cockpit floor 124 Below the cockpit floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS3367-5-9 Tiedown strap 3 G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Cotter pin IPC 27-35-00 1 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-35-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (Continued) QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Helps the other technician Below the cockpit floor I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the actuating knob and pull cable assembly (1) in its installation position. (2) Put the attachment plate of the actuating knob and pull cable assembly (1) on the control pedestal and install the screws (2) (2 positions). (3) Tighten the nut (9). (4) Put the washer (8) and nut (9) on the end of the pull cable (1). (5) Put the end of the pull cable (1) on the bellcrank (4) and install the pin (3), washer (5) and cotter pin (6). (6) Tighten the nut (7). (7) Install the tiedown straps (10) to attach the pull cable (1) of the elevator disconnect system to the pull cable of the aileron disconnect system. (8) Install the tiedown strap (11) to attach the pull cable (1) of the elevator disconnect system to the fuselage structure. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the operational check of the elevator disconnect system ( AMM TASK 27-35-00-700-801-A/500). (2) Do an inspection on the fuel quantity indication harness (AMM TASK 28-41-00-200-801-A/600). NOTE: The inspection of fuel quantity indication harness is part of Critical Design Configuration Control Limitations (CDCCL) in the Airworthiness Limitations of the Aircraft Maintenance Program. (3) Install floor panel 221EF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100). (4) Install the pilot seat (AMM TASK 25-11-01-400-801-A/400). (5) Install cockpit underfloor access hatch 123BL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-35-02 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
